segments.text: So , now I need your help again , if you don't mind . I'm taking a date to a restaurant .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd love to help you ! What is your budget for the dinner ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: She strikes me as being very sophisticated . Only the best will do for her .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , what do you think about our very own hotel restaurant ? It is very upscale , with a three-star rating .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't want to be cooped up in my own hotel tonight . How about another restaurant ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The Gramercy Tavern is highly rated . It has great food and live jazz , but it's not cheap .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , that sounds like a winner . Would you please call them to reserve a table ?
segments.speaker: S1
